lines.gurmukhi: kOn gun gwie kY rIJweIAY gun inDwn kvn mohn jg mohn ibmohIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Kaoun Goun Gaai Kai Reejhaaeeai Goun Nidhaana , Kavan Mohan Jag Mohan Bimoheeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Singing what virtues of the treasure-house of merits can we please Him? With what pleasant actions can we enamor the bewitcher of the world?

lines.gurmukhi: kOn suK dY kY suKswgr srx ghON BUKn kvn icMqwmix mn mohIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Kaoun Soukh Dai Kai Soukhasaagar Saran Gahaoun , Bhookhan Kavan Chintaamani Man Moheeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: What comfort can be offered to the sea of comforts that would provide us His refuge? With what embellishments can we captivate the mind of the Lord who fulfils all desires?

lines.gurmukhi: koit bHmwNf ky nwXk kI nwXkw hÍY kYsy AMqRjwmI kOn aukq kY bohIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Koti Brahamaand Kay Naayak Kee Naayakaa Hvai , Kaisay Antrajaamee Kaoun Oukat Kai Boheeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: How can one become the wife of the Lord-Master of millions of Universes? With what means and methods can the knower of inner things be apprised of the anguish of the mind?

lines.gurmukhi: qnu mnu Dnu hY srbsu ibsÍ jwN kY bsu kYsy bsu AwvY jwN kI soBw lg sohIAY ]602]
lines.transliteration_english: Tanu Manu Dhanu Hai Sarabasu Bisv Jaan Kai Basu , Kaisay Basu Aavai Jaan Kee Sobhaa Lag Soheeai ?602?

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord who has the mind, body, wealth and the world in His control, involvement in whose praise one becomes adorable; how can such a Lord be brought in one's favour?  (602)
